description: Manage IP configuration of a private link to configure its capability.

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config add
commands.summary: Add an IP configuration to a private link to scale up its capability.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link ip-config add --gateway-name
                                                          --name
                                                          --private-link
                                                          --resource-group
                                                          [--ip-address]
                                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                          [--primary {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config add -n MyIPConfig -g MyResourceGroup  --gateway-name MyGateway --private-link MyPrivateLink --primary true

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config list
commands.summary: List all the IP configurations of a private link.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link ip-config list --gateway-name
                                                           --private-link
                                                           --resource-group
examples: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config list -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway --private-link MyPrivateLink

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config remove
commands.summary: Remove an IP configuration from a private link to scale down its capability.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link ip-config remove --gateway-name
                                                             --name
                                                             --private-link
                                                             --resource-group
                                                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                             [--yes]
examples: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config remove -n MyIPConfig -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway --private-link MyPrivateLink --yes

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config show
commands.summary: Show an IP configuration of a private link.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link ip-config show --gateway-name
                                                           --name
                                                           --private-link
                                                           --resource-group
examples: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config show -n MyIPConfig -g MyResourceGroup --gateway-name MyGateway --private-link MyPrivateLink

commands.name: az network application-gateway private-link ip-config wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
commands.syntax:
az network application-gateway private-link ip-config wait [--created]
                                                           [--custom]
                                                           [--deleted]
                                                           [--exists]
                                                           [--gateway-name]
                                                           [--ids]
                                                           [--interval]
                                                           [--resource-group]
                                                           [--subscription]
                                                           [--timeout]
                                                           [--updated]
